title: Hulk Mega Pack - Planet Hulk, WHH and Aftersmash (complete)
description:
This torrent contains the complete Planet Hulk, World War Hulk, and WWH: Aftersmash story arcs.

The reading orders are annotated with .txt files for PH and WWH. The files themselves are also numbered. I did not create the PH list myself (though I may have tweaked it a bit). I did create the reading order for WWH myself, so if there are any discrepancies, I'm to blame. However, I just re-read the entire pack in the order I have created and it seems to flow well enough for me.

All praise goes to the original DCP, Minutemen & Indy scanners for the REAL work that went into this. I just compiled it into a neat package.

Thanks, and enjoy.

If you like it. Buy it. Support the comics industry.


Note:

As Marvel continues to pump out new titles stemming from the PH and WWH story arcs, I'll be releasing update packs periodically. As well, I also plan to include other ongoing and mini's that are Hulk-related in these packs. Eventually, most likely at the end of the 12 issue run of WWH Chronicles, everything will be re-bundled in a v2 pack.


Add-on pack #1 has been upped. See comments below for link.
